errors.p1: Please check the following problem or problems

errors.format: Name must start with a letter and only include letters a to z, hyphens, apostrophes, full stops, spaces and ampersands.
errors.length: Name must be 70 characters or less.
Account number must be 70 characters or less.
errors.format: Account number must only include numbers 0 to 9, letters a to z, hyphens, full stops, spaces, commas, slashes, apostrophes, asterisks, ampersands and brackets.

errors.required: Enter the bank or branch code.
errors.format: Bank or branch code must only include numbers 0 to 9, letters a to z, hyphens, full stops, spaces, commas, slashes, apostrophes, asterisks, ampersands and brackets.
errors.length: Bank or branch code must be 70 characters or less.
